page.title: 12Our School
page.content: The school is about 150 years old. It is built of hamstone and the roof is made of tiles. It is a small school with about 30 children divided into two classes - one class called Infants and one called Juniors. The children start at our school when they are 4 or 5 and they leave when they are 9. There are 3 classrooms in school. Two classes are used for classrooms and the other room is used as a dinner room and TV room. We have a small playground where we all play together, but in summer we can go up to our school field where we can play games like cricket and rounders. My school is a nice place with lots of things to do. We make things, do painting, numbers, writing and reading. My school is colourful and warm.
